Text: Next up will be IF (complete run 1952-1989, 176 issues), Science Wonder Stories/Wonder Stories (complete run 1930-1936, 66 issues), and Fantastic Adventures (1939-1953, 122 issues, missing 7) and another 15-20 complete runs of short-run pulps and digests.

This is Amazing, Astoundig (pun intended!)
Great torrenrt.
